title: In Dreams - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Mystery   Romance   Smut   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Acting   Bickering Couple   Celebrities   Co-Workers   Cold Love Interests   Dreams   Enemies Become Lovers   Fated Lovers   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   R-18   Short Story   Showbiz   Straight Seme   Stubborn Protagonist   Writers

description: Rookie scriptwriter, Seo Kyujin, had a lucky opportunity to work with A-rank actor, Jung Hwanwoo, in a drama. On the first day of filming, Seo Kyujin met Jung Hwanwoo for the first time, beginning their strange affair. What followed was a sequence of nightmares where the two were entangled in a sexual relationship, while In reality, the two quarreled like cats and dogs. Over time Seo Kyujin adapted his situation, but struggled to differentiate between his dreams and reality. His confusion continued to increase the more they interacted…>
